ConnectionStrings.PostgresConnection: Stored in user secrets - use: dotnet user-secrets set ConnectionStrings:PostgresConnection '<value>'

StripeSettings.PublishableKey: Stored in user secrets - use: dotnet user-secrets set StripeSettings:PublishableKey '<value>'
StripeSettings.SecretKey: Stored in user secrets - use: dotnet user-secrets set StripeSettings:SecretKey '<value>'
StripeSettings.WebhookSecret: Stored in user secrets - use: dotnet user-secrets set StripeSettings:WebhookSecret '<value>'

CloudinarySettings.ApiSecret: Stored in user secrets - use: dotnet user-secrets set CloudinarySettings:ApiSecret '<value>'
